name: Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook mitigates an incident involving the execution of malicious scripts via a command-line interpreter aimed at data exfiltration.

parallel--87c8a12c-93e1-4a4e-86aa-e5d35f.name: Execute Mitigations
parallel--87c8a12c-93e1-4a4e-86aa-e5d35f.description: Kill malicious processes and isolate affected hosts simultaneously.

action--e54e1cc4-3ef0-4e99-a56d-5da8af5a.name: Kill malicious processes
action--e54e1cc4-3ef0-4e99-a56d-5da8af5a.description: Terminate any processes executing the malicious script.

action--a7d649b1-5891-4963-8357-6b0987b6.name: Isolate affected hosts
action--a7d649b1-5891-4963-8357-6b0987b6.description: Shut down the network interfaces of compromised hosts.

commands.command: ifconfig host-01 down; ifconfig host-02 down; ifconfig host-03 down

action--f767c9d3-1201-4f26-b744-d312a34a.name: Conduct a full system scan
action--f767c9d3-1201-4f26-b744-d312a34a.description: Repeatedly conduct a full system scan until the system is clean.
